scripts.pull.test: yarn run scriptId.test && yarn run pull
scripts.push.test: yarn run scriptId.test && yarn run push
scripts.deploy.test: yarn run scriptId.test && yarn run deploy
scripts.pull.production: yarn run scriptId.production && yarn run pull
scripts.push.production: yarn run scriptId.production && yarn run push
scripts.deploy.production: yarn run scriptId.production && yarn run deploy
